Package chatModule

Class ChatService

java.lang.Object
server.AbstractRestAPI
chatModule.ChatService
public class ChatService extends AbstractRestAPI
The ChatService class extends AbstractRestAPI and utilizes the Vertx framework for handling chat-related functionalities.
